member.name: T:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions
member.summary: Extensions providing commonly used operations on strings.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Get MD5 hash of the string.
member.param: The string to perform the operation on.
member.returns: A string representing the MD5 hash.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether the string contains a true-like value.
member.returns: True if the string contains a true-like value.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: Attempt to parse the string to short.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: Attempt to parse the string to integer.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: Attempt to parse the string to long.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Attempt to parse the string to DateTime.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Capitalize the first letter in a string.
member.returns: A new string with a capitalized first letter.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Extract a string between startString and endString, starting at position startFrom.
member.param: Extracts the string starting at the first occurrence of startString.
Extracts the string ending at the first occurrence of endString.
Evaluates the input string starting at startFrom index.
member.returns: The string between startString and endString, starting at startFrom.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: Convert Cyrillic letters to their latin letters representation.
member.returns: A new string with the converted letters.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: Convert Latin letters to their Cyrillic letters representation.
member.returns: A new string with the converted letters.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Converts string to latin letters and replaces forbidden characters.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Converts string to latin letters and replaces forbidden characters.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.param: String to perform the operation on.
member.returns: The first charsCount characters as a new string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Match a file extension to content type.
member.returns: The content type matched to the file extension.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Convert a string to a byte[].
member.returns: A byte[] with the string content.
